Text: Texas Lawyers holiday gift offerTexas Lawyer Special holiday offer Texas Lawyer is offering its best holiday gift package ever Give the gift theyll use all year Buy a specially priced subscriptionbook package for colleagues staff or yourself Click this link for more details wwwtexaslawyercomholidayhtm Happy holidays from Texas Lawyer holly If this message has reached you in error and you wish to be removed from our mailing list please click hereRemove me from the list wwwtexaslawyercomremovehtm
